Posts.Content: kristinpianista wrote: Hi, I'm curious about this. I'm the patient of a "famous" doc at ucsf, and haven't seen her in the flesh since last August, and am not scheduled to see her until at least June. I do see her nursing staff monthly, and they consult her on all decisions, but I feel a bit ignored. I am stable since last May, have been off chemo since September and currently get tamoxifen, zolodex, and zometa, so I'm definitely still in treatment. I'd love a reality check. I have my monthly appointment with her nurse tomorrow and am considering throwing a hissy fit. What do you think? Thanks, Kristin . Dx 1/5/2010, ILC, Stage IV, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: survey: how often do you see your oncologist? kristinpianista Lena
